document_data.name: Ravel Kouldar
document_data.mainbody: '''Ravel Kouldar''' was a powerful [[wizard]] who lived in the [[Serpent Tower]] on [[Pirate Isle]]. His tower was warded against intruders and he had a [[spider golem]] as a guard.
